metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18341 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An integer overflow leading to a heap buffer overflow in Blink in GoogleChrome prior to 71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
